column4: dean__:no i did get updates last week, but only after a manual update
perhaps make a cron job as a quick fix?
but there were a few on Monday
huh monday? which ones? i didnt get any
this update manager has left me anxious and irritated
no dean i want to see if old update manager behaviour is restored and icon shows itself when updates are ready
hmm, well I can't help you with that then, I've no idea how to check the auto update functionality
Of course, have you checked that the correct "install updates" checkboxes are checked in the software sources screen?
iam getting updates no issues but need to manually run update manager which sucks
hehe no i want the ubuntu devs to do their job, or i take money for it :P
sorry, other than the auto updates checkboxes I don't know how to ensure it's working
np dean its not a serious thing
perhaps you're set to auto install updates?
